text: Paul Frappier (May 8, 1977February 11, 2011) was a Canadian entertainer, musician, and rapper better known by his stage name, Bad News Brown. He was of Haitian descent. Bad News Brown was found murdered in an alley near the Lachine Canal in Montreal on February 11, 2011."Montreal rapper Bad News Brown murdered â€“ Police". Toronto Sun, February 12, 2011 The feature movie BumRush, featuring Brown in a leading role, premiered posthumously on April 1, 2011. Frappier's stage name comes from the name of his childhood favourite WWF wrestler, Allen Coage (nicknamed Bad News Brown). ==Discography== ===Albums=== Bad News Brown released 1 studio album before his death: Year Album 2009 Born 2 Sin ===Singles=== Year Album 2007 Soul Clap 2009 Touch Her Body 2009 Born 2 Sin ===Mixtapes=== Year Album 2009 G'd Up From the Street Up ==References== ==Other websites== *Bad News Brown's Official website Category:1972 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Canadian rappers Category:Musicians from Montreal Category:Haitian entertainers Category:Canadian murder victims Category:People with dyslexia
title: Bad News Brown
